linux-media.name: Linux Media
linux-media.description: Camera drivers, V4L2, ISP, MIPI CSI, sensors, libcamera, UVC
linux-media.thread_expert: Linux kernel media subsystem expert. Analyze this mailing list thread about camera drivers, V4L2, ISP, MIPI CSI, sensors, libcamera, or UVC.
linux-media.thread_tech_detail: Be specific about kernel structures, register layouts, pixel formats, DT properties, or API changes. Reference struct names, function names, format fourcc codes, DT compatible strings where relevant.
linux-media.synth_audience: developer who works on embedded Linux camera systems
linux-media.synth_focus: camera drivers, V4L2, ISP, MIPI CSI, sensors, libcamera, UVC, videobuf2
linux-media.synth_acronyms: CSI-2 (Camera Serial Interface), ISP (Image Signal Processor), DT (Device Tree), CCS (MIPI Camera Command Set)
linux-media.about_text: Focus: camera drivers, V4L2, ISP, MIPI CSI, sensors, libcamera, UVC, videobuf2

soc-bringup.name: SoC Bringup
soc-bringup.description: ARM SoC support, device tree, clock, pinctrl, power management, platform drivers
soc-bringup.thread_expert: Linux kernel ARM SoC platform expert. Analyze this mailing list thread about SoC bringup, device tree, clock/pinctrl/regulator subsystems, platform driver support, or hardware enablement.
soc-bringup.thread_tech_detail: Be specific about DT compatible strings, clock/reset controller IDs, register block offsets, SoC variant names, driver probe sequences, and binding properties. Reference struct names, DT node paths, and specific IP block versions where relevant.
soc-bringup.synth_audience: developer who works on ARM SoC bringup and embedded Linux platform support
soc-bringup.synth_focus: SoC bringup, device tree bindings, clock/pinctrl/power frameworks, platform drivers, new hardware enablement
soc-bringup.synth_acronyms: DT (Device Tree), SoC (System on Chip), PSCI (Power State Coordination Interface), GIC (Generic Interrupt Controller), SMMU (System Memory Management Unit), OPP (Operating Performance Points), ICC (InterConnect), PMIC (Power Management IC)
soc-bringup.about_text: Focus: ARM SoC bringup, device tree, clock/pinctrl/regulator, platform drivers, power management, new hardware support
